title: Castillo de San Marcos National Monument: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Find lessons plans about Castillo de San Marcos for use before and after your field trip or independently in your classroom.  All Curriculum Materials   CURRICULUM MATERIALS    Lesson Plans Learn More     Field Trips Bring your students to Castillo de San Marcos.  Find resources for planning your own trip, fee waiver forms, and more.  All Field Trips   FIELD TRIPS    Plan Your Field Trip Learn More     Traveling Trunks Traveling Trunks can be brought to schools to help teachers bring the Castillo de San Marcos National Monument into the classroom. All Traveling Trunks   TRAVELING TRUNK    Bring the Castillo into the classroom Learn More
